This got 24 likes??  {{champion:161}} {{champion:161}}
Yeah of course it did.  The vast majority of people on this game are raging 12 year olds.

For your information I am a mature raging
 14 year old

My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, "If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you better stop immediately." Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized exactly what was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My Mother said to me- "Don't smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed and at 21 I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because your post gave me cancer anyway.
Touching story.

are you thinking about balancing teemo? he relies too much on noob q's and noob shrooms, needs more interactivity

lol you realise that teemo takes a lot of skill in some matchups? Ever tried lux vs teemo? Lux can annihilate him if he takes 1 step out of line...he has his counters, and he counters some champs...I agree though it'd be more interesting if teemo had to manually detonate shrooms somehow. That'd be really cool and would make for some really interesting shroom use. Like you could place a shroom at a buff but the buff wouldn't set it off so you could just leave it there. also q being a skill shot is debatable..it might be interesing but it could also just make him frustrating to play since it could then be blocked by another champ, and trying to land the blind on master yi as he flies through the enemy team at you would perhaps be almost impossible if it were a skillshot. But there's food for thought there

Why nerf Kassadin so much? nerfing his E's slow duration means that regardless of his ultimate he won't be able to hit champions as much, and it made a especially fair way of getting away from faster champions or teleporting(jumping too) champions when Kassadin's ultimate is only level one!
imo they should just remove him

Exactly. The idea for his kit will never be balanced. There's just something about the concept of having virtually limitless flashes, and being able to have it on a 4 second cooldown (40% cdr)that screams OP. He doesn't have to win lane, or even come CLOSE to breaking even, because he just does anything and everything you could possibly want, whether that be split pushing with his enhanced auto attacks on turrets and never being caught for it, or being glass cannon and going in and out and destroying enemy carries with little to no risk (zhonyas and ult away), or having a tanky bruiser-ish build with ROA and IBG and being literally a garen with flash every 5 seconds, and way too much AOE damage for the ratios on his spells. In my opinion, ahri filled the niche of extremely mobile mid, and they did it in a very balanced way. She CAN be killed, she CAN be caught, and her ult is a DASH, not a flash. Not to mention the fact that it's cooldown is ACTUALLY A COOLDOWN, and not some 6 second period of "better not tower dive yet".
For the record, Netherblade does not do bonus damage to turrets. It hasn't for a long time.
